title: mzQC schema v0.1.0
description: JSON schema specifying the mzQC format v0.1.0 developed by the HUPO-PSI Quality Control working group (http://psidev.info/groups/quality-control).

version.description: Version number of the relevant mzQC JSON schema.

creationDate.description: The date and time at which the mzQC file was created (date-time in isoformat).

baseQuality.description: Base element describing a runQuality or setQuality.

runQuality.description: Parent element describing QC metrics for a single run.

setQuality.description: Parent element describing combined QC metrics for multiple runs.

cvParameter.description: Base element containing a reference to a controlled vocabulary.

accession.description: PURL reference to the term with the specified accession in its controlled vocabulary.

name.description: Name of the controlled vocabulary element describing the parameter.

unit.description: A controlled vocabulary element describing the unit of the parameter value.

fileProvenance.description: Optional string describing/documenting the provenance of the file

inputFiles.description: List of input files based on which the QC metrics were generated.

analysisSoftware.description: Software tool(s) used to generate the QC metrics.

version.description: Version number of the software tool.

uri.description: Publicly accessible URI of the software tool (documentation).

cvParameters.description: Optional cvParameter tags for the QC analysis.

inputFile.description: File based on which QC metrics were generated.

location.description: Unique file location, preferably publicly accessible.

name.description: Base file name, should be unique across the mzQC file.

fileProperties.description: Detailed properties of the input file.

namespace.description: PURL namespace of the controlled vocabulary.

name.description: Full name of the controlled vocabulary.

uri.description: Publicly accessible URI of the controlled vocabulary.
